main_definition: A bicycle or any vehicle propelled by human power through pedaling.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of riding a bike.
meanings_and_examples.example: I love the feeling of freedom when I ride my bike on the weekends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A bicycle, specifically for kids or those with disabilities.
meanings_and_examples.example: She received her first tricycle as a birthday present and has been riding it every day since then.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To teach someone how to ride a bike.
meanings_and_examples.example: My father spent hours with me until I finally learned to pedal without falling down.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term for cycling or biking as a recreational activity.
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm planning a bike trip across the country next summer.
